price: To him belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is on earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
